nodes.bodyText: Perhaps the preference key could be improved: I would not call this a "tool panel". Perhaps just ui.leftPanelWidth?

Yes @wetneb, this pref name could be better but what if we have another preference to put tools panel on the right instead of the left?
Left and right would then be inverted.
Regards,
Antoine
What I am worried about with tools is that we never refer to this panel as being a tools panel anywhere. ui.facetsHistoryPanelWidth if you prefer?
